mapper.sql: SELECT t0.id, t0.org_code, t0.patient_id, t0.visit_org_name, t0.visit_dept_name, max(t0.visit_dtime) AS visit_dtime, t0.visit_way, t0.doctor_code, t0.resp_doctor_name, t0.diag_code, t0.diag_name, t1.user_id AS doctor_user_id, t1.hospital_id, t1.dept_code, t1.dept_name, t1.mobile_phone FROM user_info t INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.id, a.org_code, a.patient_id, a.visit_org_name, a.visit_dept_name, a.visit_dept_code, a.visit_dtime, a.visit_way, a.doctor_code, a.resp_doctor_name, c.diag_code, c.diag_name FROM patient_record a LEFT JOIN patient_diag c ON (a.id = c.patient_record_id) ) t0 ON ( t.org_code = t0.org_code AND t.patient_id = t0.patient_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.user_id, u.mobile_phone, d.doctor_code, e.hospital_id, e.dept_code, e.dept_name FROM user_doctor c INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id = c.user_id INNER JOIN hospital_doctor d ON d.doctor_id = c.doctor_id INNER JOIN hospital_dept e ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id ) t1 ON t1.doctor_code = t0.doctor_code
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT t0.diag_code AS diagCode, t0.diag_name AS diagName FROM user_info t INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.org_code, a.patient_id, a.visit_org_name, a.visit_dept_name, a.visit_dtime, a.visit_way, a.doctor_code, a.resp_doctor_name, c.diag_code, c.diag_name FROM patient_record a LEFT JOIN patient_diag c ON (a.id = c.patient_record_id) ) t0 ON ( t.org_code = t0.org_code AND t.patient_id = t0.patient_id )
group by t0.org_code, t0.patient_id, t0.doctor_code, t0.diag_code order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
t0.visit_dtime desc
